Package common.networking.packet

Class PacketInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • common.networking.packet.PacketInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataInput, java.io.ObjectInput, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class PacketInputStream
extends java.io.FilterInputStream
implements java.io.ObjectInput
    An InputStream with special methods for reading Packets
